description:
Allow users to configure daily or weekly email digests summarizing activity on entities they follow, upcoming deadlines, unresolved tickets, and other personalized updates instead of individual notifications.

**Rationale:** Power users often prefer batched summaries over real-time notifications to reduce interruption. This is a standard feature in project management and CRM tools that helps users stay informed without notification fatigue.
